entry.title: once upon a broken boy
entry.summary:
Author: alleousai

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,233Chapters: 2/8Kudos: 0

Summary: “It happened when an undead certain red-helmeted menace got de-aged to a five-year-old little kid by pure circumstance and one Peter Benjamin Parker – Spider-Man – from a multiverse away had to handle his shit, for better or for worse.”   ↞↠   Jason gets de-aged all the while his brain is snapping back information at him. No one knows how he did or why or where he went, but one totally normal guy from another universe might just be the cure. But hey, Peter gets a job. And Bruce gets a second chance. (Peter and Jason only get together after Jason gets unaged!!)

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 144,205Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 275

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: You're A Good Boy, Clark Kent
entry.summary:
Author: SuperMadlyDeeply

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,294Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 24

Summary: Bruce watched in shock as something inside the suit seemed to struggle to get free, turning in small circles and plopping over several times. With shaking hands and bated breath, he reached out to undo the small zipper. Just a little. Retreating his hands enough for a small black nose to poke out of the neck hole. It sniffed curiously at the fresh air outside of the Kevlar. Soon it was followed by a little white snout, and finally big puppy dog eyes were staring back at him. A dog? No... A puppy?! Or, The one where Superman gets turned into a literal puppy during a fight, and Bruce can't help but see the irony of it.

entry.title: The Prince's Pet
entry.summary:
Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,491Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 15

Summary: For the past five hundred years, Krypton has successfully spearheaded the colonization and reeducation of twenty six alien planets. Lorded over by the Royal House of El, Krypton's forces have just declared victory over their 27th conquest. The planet X9Y-BH91, otherwise known as "Earth." As a representative for the planet, and potentially a candidate for the new world order, the Earthling Lex Luthor has come to Krypton with a peace offering; a small selection of humans as gifts. One in particular is promised to the oldest son of the House of El, Kal. But Kal-El's pet is not docile, not subservient, not obedient. And for a prince considered soft to the touch, Kal's pet proves to be one hell of a problem. As for Bruce Wayne, a man who has lost everything--his children, his wealth, his home--no measure is too drastic to escape the planet Krypton. When sheer force does not work, Bruce decides he can seduce his master into a false sense of security before killing him in his sleep and jumping ship back to Earth. A fool proof plan. Or at least, it would have been... had he not fallen in love with Kal-El in the process.

entry.title: Take a chance on me
entry.summary:
Author: Panickymouse29

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,077Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Aileen Allen was recruited into the Avatar Program at twenty-two after drawing RDA attention for her effectiveness in close-quarters security operations where escalation repeatedly failed. She wasn’t chosen for aggression, but for control—she ended threats quickly and quietly in environments where firearms were a liability. The RDA classified her as difficult: independent, resistant to rigid command, and openly critical of excessive force. Those traits would normally have ended her candidacy. Dr. Grace Augustine intervened, citing Aileen’s adaptability and restraint as exactly what the program lacked. On Pandora, Aileen immediately modified her uniform for mobility and heat, ignoring protocol in favour of survival. She demonstrated an unusual tendency to de-escalate Na’vi encounters rather than provoke them, earning Grace’s quiet approval—and RDA’s suspicion. By the time Jake Sully arrived, Aileen was already operating on the fringe of RDA control: respected by the scientists, tolerated by command, and trusted by Grace to act when others would make things worse.Pandora didn’t recruit Aileen Allen. Grace Augustine did.

entry.title: The Care and Feeding of Clark Kent
entry.summary:
Author: ramblingsofamadnb

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,994Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: Perry White: What an appetite! He's famished! Man, look at him gulp down that five pound steak! Clark, thinking to himself: A simple feat for Superman! Actually, I could consume every scrap of food in the kitchen and yell for more! --Superman #133, How Perry White Hired Clark Kent When Bruce and Clark have dinner at the Kents' farm, Bruce realizes for the first time just how big Clark's appetite really is. He worries now that Clark has been holding back for most of his life, never eating as much as he needs out of fear that it's too much food for one man to take. With a little help from Martha Kent, Bruce vows to do something about that.
